text: <StatBlockSection Defense  [(u'AC', u'15, touch 10, flat-footed 14 (+1 Dex, +5 natural, –1 size)'), (u'hp', u'47 (5d10+20)'), (u'Fort', u'+10'), (u'Ref', u'+5'), (u'Will', u'+2')]><StatBlockSection Offense  [(u'Speed', u'30 ft.'), (u'Melee', u'2 claws +8 (1d6+4 plus grab), bite +8 (1d6+4)'), (u'Space', u'10 ft.'), (u'Reach', u'5 ft.')]><StatBlockSection Ecology  [(u'Environment', u'temperate forests'), (u'Organization', u'solitary, pair, or pack (3–8)'), (u'Treasure', u'incidental')]>
